price: په اسمانونو او ځمكه كې هر څه الله لره دي، بې شكه هماغه الله بې پروا ستايل شوى دى.
arabic: لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
